description: This middle eastern inspired lamb meatball with herby, zingy quinoa takes no time at all to whip up.
keywords: Meatballs,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Lamb,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar
name: Lamb Meatballs with Minty Quinoa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Place the lamb meatballs in a roasting tin and drizzle with oil. Bake for 15-18 minutes or until cooked through.

Whisk the harissa, oil and lemon juice together in a small bowl. Cook the quinoa according to pack instructions and tip into a large bowl. Stir in half of the harissa sauce, the herbs, dried apricots, lemon zest and spring onions and mix well.
Serve the meatballs on top of the quinoa mix drizzled with the rest of the harissa sauce and scattered with chopped pistachios.
